channel.title: Posts on Maya Josyula
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Maya Josyula

item.title: Generative art from emotions
item.description: I’ve been experimenting with p5.js, a JavaScript library for creative coding, and made a project that scans user-given text and draws varying color/intensity circles based on its associated emotions. Here’s a link to the final result in the p5.js editor. Replace line 3 of sketch.js with your own text and see what you get! (Results may vary.) Example Input: "Fear is a strange soil. It grows obedience like corn, which grow in straight lines to make weeding easier.

item.title: Attempt to run fast.ai notebooks locally
item.description: These are some notes from my attempt to install fastai and fastbook locally and run the Jupyter notebooks from the fast.ai course using my laptop, instead of using a service like Paperspace Gradient or Google Colab. It didn’t completely work, so I might try again later. Summary It is possible to install fastai on Windows 10. It is possible to get PyTorch to recognize the GPU on a laptop. A 2GB GPU does not appear to be enough memory to run fast.
